name: edit_file
description: Performs in-place editing of a file on the filesystem using a provided sed command. It can simulate changes with a dry run.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the target file to be edited.

sed_command.description: The sed expression used for editing the file. Exclude flags and the file path.

dry_run.description: If set to true, the function will simulate the edit and return possible changes without modifying the file.

returns.description: The result object containing 'stdout' with the command output or changes, 'stderr' with error messages, and 'exit_code' indicating the success or failure of the command.

stdout.description: The standard output from the sed command or the changes if dry run is true.

exit_code.description: The exit code of the sed command where 0 indicates success.
